statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses
SELECT response_text, response_category FROM survey_responses
SELECT response_id, survey_id, response_text, response_category FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_category = 'positive'
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_category='Positive' ORDER BY response_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE response_text LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY response_category, response_id DESC
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE response_category='Negative'
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT response_text, respondent_id FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_id = 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM SurveyCategories WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT id, survey_id FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_text LIKE 'Excellent%' ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT response_text, survey_id FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_id = 10;
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(*) FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY respondent_id;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses INNER JOIN SurveyCategories ON SurveyResponses.survey_id = SurveyCategories.id;
SELECT id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_text ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM responses;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_name DESC;
SELECT respondent_id, response_text FROM responses WHERE respondent_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 2 ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE respondent_id = 1
SELECT response_text FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 2 ORDER BY response_id DESC
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 3
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM responses JOIN categories ON responses.survey_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT DISTINCT survey_id, respondent_id, response_text FROM responses WHERE survey_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY respondent_id ASC
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 456 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses JOIN SurveyAnswers ON SurveyResponses.response_id = SurveyAnswers.response_id;
SELECT question_text, option_1, option_2, option_3 FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE survey_id IN (789, 890);
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_id = 1 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, survey_id, respondent_id FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND respondent_id = 3;
SELECT response_id, question_id, selected_option FROM SurveyAnswers WHERE question_id = 2 ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT survey_id, question_id, option_1, option_2, option_3 FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT category_name, question_text FROM SurveyCategories JOIN SurveyQuestions ON SurveyCategories.question_id = SurveyQuestions.question_id WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY question_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM response_categories LIMIT 10
SELECT survey_title, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT response_text, respondent_id FROM survey_responses ORDER BY respondent_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 4
SELECT question_text FROM questions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice'
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 1 ORDER BY response_id DESC
SELECT survey_title, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_id IN (1,2,3)
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions WHERE question_type = 'multiple choice'
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC
SELECT response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1 AND question_id = 2
